record.name: iPaq
record.detailedDescription:
Great for performance and connectivity

• Intel PXA270 processor (520MHz)
• Windows Mobile 5.0 for Pocket PC, Premium Edition
• 256 MB total memory (192 MB ROM 64 MB RAM)
• Up to 192 MB user available persistent storage memory
• Bluetooth wireless technology, WLAN 802.11b, Serial IR
• 3.5" transflective TFT screen with LED backlight
• SD, CF slots
• 1440 mAh battery
• Enhanced security
• One-year limited warranty
